name: Evolo.Mine
description:
Evolo.Mine is a fascinating clicker about mining crystals.
Collect resources, build new buildings. Increase your profit!

Many different buildings, beautiful and easy to use interface.

If you like thoughtful and good games and are not afraid to immerse yourself in the mechanics of this game, then you will be satisfied.
Welcome to the world of Evolo. Chaotic world of evolution.
